fields.Title: LAIR ORB / beware shivers
fields.Condition: Variable["boardwalk.orb_shivers_warning_done"] == false  and  IsKimHere()  and  Variable["TASK.enter_cavern_done"] == false
fields.Description: A dialogue with Pain Threshold foreshadowing end game.

fields.Title: START
input
You: ""Do you think whatever happens will..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do you think whatever happens will affect our cryptozoologists?"

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: (Variable["whirling.lena_intro_done"]  or  Variable["whirling.lena_main_main_hub_reached"]  or  Variable["coast.morell_greeting_done"])  and  Variable["TASK.report_to_lena_done"] == false

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well... we're not responsible for..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well... we're not responsible for what we can't predict, are we? I don't think the *entire* city will be razed to the ground." He smiles in the dark.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Let's *try* not to worry, he thinks..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Let's *try* not to worry, he thinks.

fields.Title: Authority: "He trusts your gut feeling on this."
fields.Dialogue Text: He trusts your gut feeling on this.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He lowers his voice. "Once we detai..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He lowers his voice. "Once we detain a credible suspect, who knows what the Union and the Wild Pines will do? We'll set in motion events we have no control over."

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Not closely enough, you suspect. Bu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Not closely enough, you suspect. But still -- good idea to visit her once more.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hmm..." He looks ahead, beyond the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmm..." He looks ahead, beyond the arch. "Either way, we ought to be careful. There were footprints back there. And I'm pretty sure they were fresh."

fields.Title: You: ""I saw them too. Footprints with th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I saw them too. Footprints with the right sole worn smooth."

fields.Title: You: ""We know Evrart's true intentions *..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We know Evrart's true intentions *and* his plan for Martinaise. What more is there to do with the Union?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know, little things?" He p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know, little things?" He pauses. "But you're right. We've gotten everything we can from the Union."
fields.Alternate1: "I don't know, little things?" He pauses. "But you're right. We've gotten everything we can from the Union -- we even opened that container..."
fields.Alternate2: "I don't know, little things?" He pauses. "But you're right. We've gotten everything we can from the Union -- we even did the borscht thing..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You mean Lena? I don't see how cry..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You mean Lena? I don't see how cryptozoology and the murder investigation are connected. But... the situation in the city will get tense for everyone."

fields.Title: Untitled hub
You: ""Nothing. It's just my mind playing..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing. It's just my mind playing tricks."

fields.Title: You: ""You think it's the suspect who lef..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You think it's the suspect who left the prints?"

fields.Title: You: ""We still don't know the full exten..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We still don't know the full extent of Evrart's plans. I told Joyce -- maybe we should see Evrart again?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [mainhub]
You: "[Discard thought.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Discard thought.]

fields.Title: You: ""Hold on, you really don't feel any..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hold on, you really don't feel anything?"

fields.Title: You: ""We've met Joyce, but we don't know..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We've met Joyce, but we don't know what she knows yet. We should probably find out."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["pier.joyce_met"]  and  Variable["TASK.what_does_joyce_done"] == false  and  Variable["TASK.solve_the_strike_deadlock_done"] == false

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. What do you mean?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No. What do you mean?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Possibly. If she's in here, we nee..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Possibly. If she's in here, we need to plan our next step carefully."

fields.Title: You: ""What do you mean?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you mean?"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "It's not a quib. The situation is d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's not a quib. The situation is dangerous.

fields.Title: You: ""We haven't met the Union leader ye..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We haven't met the Union leader yet. We should maybe get into the harbour before this?"

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "...in this case, we can't afford to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: ...in this case, we can't afford to be squeaky clean.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If you want to do that, then yes...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If you want to do that, then yes. We'd be advised to finish every lead. I don't think we'll have the chance to after..." He looks down the dark tunnel. He does not finish the thought.

fields.Title: You: ""We've met the Union leader, but ha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We've met the Union leader, but haven't gotten any info from him. Maybe we should talk to him more first?"

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: (Variable["cargo.evrart_main_hub_reached"] == true  or  Variable["cargo.evrart_evrart_met"] == true)  and  Variable["TASK.open_gary_door"] == false

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're right, there won't be time..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right, there won't be time to do that when the dominoes are falling. At the first sign of danger, they will shut the place down for good."

fields.Title: Logic: "If you can't predict it, there's no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: If you can't predict it, there's nothing you could have done.

fields.Title: You: ""A pain, a strange tingling.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "A pain, a strange tingling."

fields.Title: You: ""A ghost.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "A ghost."

fields.Title: Interfacing: "His hand rests on his holster. It's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: His hand rests on his holster. It's not enough -- you need a gun in your hand, too. *Your* gun.

fields.Title: You: ""We know what Joyce knows about the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We know what Joyce knows about the murder -- but I may have *other things* to discuss with her."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["TASK.solve_the_strike_deadlock_done"] == false  and  Variable["TASK.what_does_joyce_done"]  and  ((Variable["TASK.get_reality_lowdown"]  and  Variable["TASK.get_reality_lowdown_done"] == false)  or  Variable["tc.pale"] == false)

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "I wouldn't be so sure. You haven't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I wouldn't be so sure. You haven't exactly been sneaking.

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "You can't, the sensation won't go a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You can't, the sensation won't go away. It only gets worse...

fields.Title: You: ""I suddenly remembered -- we were r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I suddenly remembered -- we were running the serial number on the victim's armour..."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["TASK.run_serial_number"]  and  Variable["TASK.run_serial_number_done"] == false  and  Variable["TASK.run_serial_number_cancelled"] == false

fields.Title: You: ""How bad do you think things could..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How bad do you think things could get?"

fields.Title: Logic: "It's a minor point. Don't worry too..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's a minor point. Don't worry too much about this. There are bigger fish.

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "You feel something -- like a swarm..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You feel something -- like a swarm of hornets buzzing under your scalp. A strange tingling you can almost *smell*.
fields.Alternate1: There it is again -- like a swarm of hornets buzzing under your scalp. A strange tingling you can almost *smell*.

fields.Title: You: ""Lieutenant, do you feel something?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lieutenant, do you feel something?"

fields.Title: mainhub
You: ""We haven't even met the company re..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We haven't even met the company rep yet. We should find them first, no?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ah, yes. There won't be time for t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ah, yes. There won't be time for that once things go down. Matter of fact -- I don't think there's time for it *now*, but..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Or... maybe not." He puts his hand..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Or... maybe not." He puts his hand to his holster. "Either way, once we go deeper, there will be no turning back."

fields.Title: You: ""We've found out Evrart's plan to t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We've found out Evrart's plan to take the harbour -- maybe we should tell Joyce about it?"

fields.Title: Volition: "Keep calm. Go over the whole situat..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Keep calm. Go over the whole situation in detail.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "You've been very, very thorough the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You've been very, very thorough there. Your fingers approve.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We absolutely cannot skip that app..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We absolutely cannot skip that appointment." His face is stone. "Consider that 100% confirmed. I fear you'll need your gun for this..."

fields.Title: You: ""We solved the strike deadlock by t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We solved the strike deadlock by telling Joyce about the Union's plans."

fields.Title: Volition: "Someone's been a very busy boy. Goo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Someone's been a very busy boy. Good on you...

fields.Title: You: ""We've still got a date with The Pi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We've still got a date with The Pigs... and *my gun*."

fields.Title: Variable["coast.morell_greeting_done"]
Variable["coast.morell_greeting_done"]
!(Variable["coast.morell_greeting_done"])
Visual Calculus: "He's right. That place is like a fo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's right. That place is like a fortress. It's already almost impenetrable.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "If it gets that tense, the amateur..."
fields.Dialogue Text: If it gets that tense, the amateur zoologists might not be able to do their job.

fields.Title: You: ""Maybe we should finish looking int..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe we should finish looking into the Speedfreaks FM mystery?"

fields.Title: You: ""Evrart knows more than he's told u..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Evrart knows more than he's told us. Maybe we should continue working for him?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Definitely. I think she knows some..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Definitely. I think she knows something -- about the mercenaries, maybe. And she won't be around if the situation explodes."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No -- but you're the sensitive one.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No -- but you're the sensitive one."

fields.Title: Interfacing: "This part of town is a fine clockwo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This part of town is a fine clockwork puzzle. Disturb its peace and it will start breaking down -- uncontrollably.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're right, however corrupt he m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right, however corrupt he may be, nothing happens in Martinaise without him knowing. We might have to dirty our hands, but..."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "He just can't be sure -- maybe it w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He just can't be sure -- maybe it will yield something useful?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I still don't think that was a goo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I still don't think that was a good idea, but, yes -- our affairs with the Wild Pines are in order. Since she isn't in Martinaise anymore."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You think we should finish running..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You think we should finish running it *now*?" he whispers. "Maybe you're right. It might not be as useful later..."

fields.Title: You: ""What do you think is waiting for u..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you think is waiting for us there?" (Conclude.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't feel it, but..." He looks..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't feel it, but..." He looks ahead, beyond the arch. "We should still be careful. There were footprints back there. And I'm pretty sure they were fresh."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'll leave that to your judgement...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'll leave that to your judgement. You already know what I think about cross-pollinating information like this. It's dangerous, but..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Definitely. It amazes me how we've..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Definitely. It amazes me how we've managed not to... The Wild Pines has information that may be critical to our case."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "...if you must."
fields.Dialogue Text: ...if you must.

fields.Title: You: ""I saw them too, in the sand back t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I saw them too, in the sand back there. Do you think it's our suspect?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You mean Morell? I don't see how c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You mean Morell? I don't see how cryptozoology and the murder investigation are connected. But... the situation in the city will get tense for everyone."

fields.Title: Logic: "You will upset the balance of power..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You will upset the balance of power in Martinaise. The deadlock between the company and the Union will destabilize.

fields.Title: You: ""We've checked the buoy with Klaasj..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We've checked the buoy with Klaasje's documents. I want to hear her take on why it was empty before."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay -- why not. Whatever goes dow..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay -- why not. Whatever goes down might also affect her. The Union is watching her closely now..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I think I see a cavern..." The lie..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think I see a cavern..." The lieutenant's whisper echoes down the tunnel. "Maybe more cellars? I think we've been careful enough -- we still have the element of surprise."

fields.Title: Untitled hub (02)
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Looks like our suspect -- if she's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Looks like our suspect -- if she's in here, we need to plan our next step carefully."
